scripts.auth: cd ../masterchat/extra/credential-fetcher && npm i && npm run start
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e test.env jest --detectOpenHandles=true --verbose=true
scripts.test:db: dotenv -e test.env yarn prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e debug.env npx prisma db push
scripts.db:pull: dotenv -e debug.env npx prisma db pull
scripts.migrate:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e debug.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/migrations/applySchemaMigrations.js
scripts.migrate:schema: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e debug.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/migrations/migrateSchema.js
scripts.migrate:debug_deprecated: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e debug.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/migrations/applyMigrations.js
scripts.migrate:data_deprecated: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e debug.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/migrations/migrateData.js
scripts.migrate:release: yarn run db:dump && dotenv -e release.env npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.snapshot:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug BUILD=tsc dotenv -e debug.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/RefreshSnapshots.js
scripts.snapshot:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=release BUILD=tsc dotenv -e release.env node ../../dist/debug/server/scripts/RefreshSnapshots.js
